about_the_game:
Fill your farming game with active NPCs thanks to the Summerwind Saga - Characters pack! Elv Games is here with another addition to their Summerwind Saga series, this time offering up a ton of character sprites with matching behaviors so you can give everyone in your game world’s activities. Have armored knights protect townsfolk by cutting through bandits with swords, farmers prepare their fields by hoeing the ground, injured villagers flat on the ground after a surprise attack, and more with this pack!

126 character sheets are ready to fill your towns and cities with unique characters so that your players can easily find the specific NPC who gave them their latest side quest. Each character sheet comes in two sizes so you can easily drop them into your MV/MZ or Ace game, or use them in your favorite engine. If your farming villages have been needing NPCs out in the fields caring for crops or you want to let your players choose their hero and hack-and-slash their way to success, check out the Summerwind Saga - Characters pack!


Contents:

・30 RPG Character Sprites
・96 RPG Knight Character Sprites
・Every character has attack/dead animations

- 4 Directions walking animation
- 4 Directions attack animation (Sword)
- 4 Directions attack animation (Axe)
- 4 Directions attack animation (Pickaxe)
- 4 Directions attack animation (Watering Can)
- 4 Directions attack animation (Hoe)
- Dead sprite
